title: SunnyParallax Image Component
content:
+++ {$caption}
[[collapsible show="+ Show image" hide="- Hide image"]]
[[div style="border: 1px solid #000;"]]
[[div style="height: 100%;"]]
[[=image {$src} alt="{$caption}" title="{$caption}" width="{$width}"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/collapsible]]
author: Crayne
